title: is the rune thing next patch?

replies.body: no its 2 paches from now so 7.21 on novemember 8th.
than why they are  balancing the champions for runes now?
The Runes related balance changes, like the Runes themselves, are on PBE but won't be part of the next patch. They're also still works in progress.
So is it safe to say that next patch will be fairly light balance-wise: Just Eve's update and some skin stuff?
So they can test out the compensation buffs along side the new runes.

1. Its on patch 7.22 OR 7.24 I believe, I think 7.22
2. They are balancing now because, as the preseason is a massive mess of unbalance in which they ship a ton of content, they need to extensively test it, not just internally but on the PBE as well.
November the 8th yes, it'll be patch 7.22 though (two more patches between now and then, not one).

This is probably not the right place to ask this, but as I find different answers around the web [ {{champion:60}} ], I'll just pop it here: Will there be a special reward for those being above Gold V (or a rank at all) in all three queues (Solo-Duo/Flex/3v3)?

_I haven't bothered with 3v3 at all this year (only Duo and Flex), but if there is something in store for those with all three queues nailed, I better get around to it._
